bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with jing meng 驚夢 , fright dream. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥 , xie sui 邪祟 , evil curse: 古櫬板，鬼氣疰忤，中惡心腹痛，夢 悸，常為鬼神祟撓，和桃枝煎酒服，取吐下 , “Old coffin boards: Demon-qi attachment-illness and hostility, being struck by the malign with heartache and abdominal pain, and dream palpitation , this is often the impact of a demon-spirit’s curse. Boil [old coffin boards] with the twigs of a peach tree and ingest this with wine to remove [the ailment] by vomiting and purging”.
